title: All
author: Scott Tindal
cleaned_text: [ Beyond Pasta: The New Rules of Carb Loading ](https://www.womensrunning.com/health/food/beyond-pasta-the-new-rules-of-carb-loading/) When it comes to carb loading, what exactly does the latest science say about an age-old practice—and what are the best protocols to follow to ensure we hit the start
